Live blog | Oscars red carpet > Underway

Stars arrive at the Oscars

Join us for the first-ever Red Carpet Rumble, where your tweets are determining the fashion winners and losers at the Academy Awards.

Live Oscars updates

    Pictures | The Academy Awards: 8:30 p.m. on ABC

    Who rules on the Oscars red carpet?

    Amy Adams is nominated for best supporting actress for her performance in “The Master.” She is wearing Oscar de la Renta. John Shearer/Invision/AP
    Actor Eddie Redmayne stars in "Les Miserables," which is nominated for eight Oscars, including best picture. Frederic J. Brown/Getty Images
    Quvenzhane Wallis, 9, who is nominated for best actress for her role in “Beasts of the Southern Wild,” arrived sporting her signature puppy purse. Jason Merritt/Getty Images
    Jessica Chastain is nominated for best actress for her performance in “Zero Dark Thirty.” She's wearing Armani. Frederic J. Brown/Getty Images
    Reese Witherspoon opted for a Louis Vuitton gown and jewels. Jason Merritt/Getty Images
    Actress Kristin Chenoweth and singer Kelly Rowland posed on the red carpet. Jason Merritt/Getty Images
    “Good Morning America” host Robin Roberts arrived at the awards show in a floor-length Marc Bouwer gown. Frazer Harrison/Getty Images
    Medford native and “Extra” host Maria Menounos arrived on the red carpet. Jason Merritt/Getty Images
    "Extra" host Mario Lopez arrived at the Academy Awards. Jason Merritt/Getty Images
    LIVE with Kelly and Michael” host and retired NFL star Michael Strahan walked the red carpet. Frazer Harrison/Getty Images
    • Oscar films blur fact, fiction, art | Make an Oscar statue
    • Academy Awards nominees | Vote Your Oscar ballot
